Comment.val:
This program handles the fourth and last step of a Wizard sequence before actually producing the end result. Specifying an interface document where the data view information will be written is necessary for the utility to store a result that will be opened and presented on the screen afterwards.
Paramenters: Task ID(pi): Task Id of current online process. Next Step(po): Next step to go to upon completion of this wizard step.
/*Task Id of current online process above.*/
/*Next step to go to upon completion of this wizard step.*/
